ability.Soapy Grace: Contact moves have a 30% chance to lower the attacker's accuracy by 1 stage.
ability.Bubble Cloak: Reduces damage from Special moves by 25%. If hit by a Special move, has a 20% chance to reduce the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.

Bubble Slide.effect: Has a 20% chance to reduce the target's Speed by 1 stage.

Soothing Mist.effect: Heals the user by 50% of its maximum HP and cures any status conditions.

Pressurized Jet.effect: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.
